description:
The salesperson at the doll shop. He has a genuine passion for the dolls, even explaining dolls` feelings to Jun and Tomoe, but there is a sinister air about him. He is actually Laplace no Ma, the demon of Laplace.
In Rozen Maiden Ã¶uverture, it is revealed that he has been in Enju`s company since before Shinku and Suigintou`s rivalry began, and was searching for Rozen Maidens even then, though it is not said why.
name: Shirosaki
